title: Fire Giant
contents: property | Saving Throws | Dex +3, Con +10, Cha +5
description | Siege Monster | The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.
description | Tackle | When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
description | Multiattack | The giant makes two greatsword attacks .
description | Greatsword | Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) slashing damage.
description | Rock | Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
